overview: Directed by Nick Moretti and produced by T.I.M. founder Paul Morris, Damaged Goods features five brutal scenes where submissive sluts are broken down, beaten, and left begging for more. You'll want to watch this one from beginning to end to experience every ass-bruising smack, ball-torturing tug and hole-filling load.  “Damaged Goods is exciting new territory for me," states Paul Morris. "The men who follow my work should brace themselves for some twisted shit, unlike anything I've ever produced.”
tagline: Break me down and rebuild me.
title: Damaged Goods
